I've always thought that towers should have a "boiling
oil" special attack, that damages units adjacent to
the tower. It would make tower-defended doorways more
perilous. I also think that towers should perhaps be
more resilient to missile attacks, so that people need
to get close in order to destroy them. Towers, as they
are, are weak against mages and archers. There's also
the possibility that they could act as
"detectors"--much like the "Magic Sentinel" ability in
Warcraft III, the towers would be able to see
invisible units within a certain range.
   -Tevildo, Prince of Cats.
